ctx: intros h d client id c os d' ms H m Hin.
exceptions.tactic: remember (handleClientRequest h d client id c) as res.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params h : name d : network client : name -> data id : list packet c : list raft_output os : raft_data d' : list (name * msg) ms : clientId H : nat m : input Hin : handleClientRequest h (nwState d h) ms H m = (c, os, d') The term "d" has type "network" while it is expected to have type "raft_data".

ctx: intros h d client id c os d' ms H m Hin.
exceptions.exn: The reference res was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros h d client id c os d' ms H m Hin.
exceptions.tactic: assert (os' = os /\ d'' = d' /\ ms'' = ms) as [Ho [Hd Hm]].
exceptions.exn: The reference os' was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros h d client id c os d' ms H m Hin.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

original: intros h d client id c os d' ms H m Hin. remember (handleClientRequest h d client id c) as res. destruct res as [[os' d''] ms'']. assert (os' = os /\ d'' = d' /\ ms'' = ms) as [Ho [Hd Hm]]. - now inversion H. subst. destruct (handleClientRequest h d client id c) eqn:Hc. destruct p as [os'']. destruct p as [d'']. assert (os = os'') by congruence. assert (d' = d'') by congruence. assert (ms = ms'') by congruence. subst os'' d'' ms''. clear H. apply doGenericServer_spec with (h:=h) (d:=d) (os:=os) (d':=d') in Hc. destruct Hc as [_ [_ His]]. apply His. auto.
